team.name: Tommy
team.description: He is the head of the Japan team and the first Vice President of RIRA Institute of Technology.

team.name: Ame-chan
team.description: The student director of RIT the person who drew TOMOZ.

team.name: Gumi-chan
team.description: Director of the Overseas Cooperation Center at RIT and is in charge of publicity and overseas communications.

team.name: TREE
team.description: Manager of General Affairs Office. She wants to meet E-MATE who likes rockets.

team.name: Doge
team.description: He fixes all of the computers of RIT. He works on the blockchain.

team.name: Arvitor
team.description: He is the head of the NFTcircle. He is a pioneer in NFT World and advertise NFTs.

team.name: Luluralo
team.description: He is the head of the Korea team. When the university was built, he carried the bricks directly.

team.name: Tommy
team.description: RIT日本チーム長であり、副学長として働いています。

team.name: Ame-chan
team.description: RITの学生センター長として勤めており、TOMOZを描いた張本人です。

team.name: Gumi-chan
team.description: 海外協力センター長です。大学の広報や海外発信をしています。

team.name: TREE
team.description: RITの総務室長です。ロケットが好きなE-MATEに憧れています。

team.name: Doge
team.description: RITパソコン工学科出身で、彼は大学に存在するすべてのパソコンを直します。

team.name: Arvitor
team.description: RITのNFT収集サークル長です。NFTの魅力を知らせることで先頭に立ています。

team.name: Luluralo
team.description: RITの韓国チーム長です。大学が建てられるとき、直接レンガを運びました。

team.name: Tommy
team.description: RIT의 일본 팀장이자 부총장님입니다. TOMOZ 커뮤티니를 유지하고 있습니다.

team.name: Ame-chan
team.description: RIT의 학생처장입니다. TOMOZ 컬렉션을 그려주었습니다.

team.name: Gumi-chan
team.description: RIT의 해외 협력 센터장입니다. 대학의 홍보나 해외 발신을 하고 있습니다.

team.name: TREE
team.description: RIT의 총무실장입니다. 로켓을 좋아하는 E-MATE를 만나고 싶어합니다.

team.name: Doge
team.description: RIT의 컴퓨터 수리기사입니다. 블록체인 위에서 노동을 하고 있습니다.

team.name: Arvitor
team.description: RIT의 NFT수집동아리장입니다. NFT의 매력을 알리는데 앞장서고 있습니다.

team.name: Luluralo
team.description: RIT의 한국팀장입니다. 리라공대가 지어질 때 직접 벽돌을 날랐습니다.
